title: Pearl Manor - 4th floor - Hardwood Flrs - Granite Counters-Avail 9/9
posting_body: Remodeled unit - Large Living room with Hardwood Floors/Carpet in Bedrooms
650 SqFt - 1 Bedroom - 1 Bath - 4th Floor Unit - Hardwood Floors in
Living room - Carpet in Bedroom - Open Dining area - Full Kitchen with Granite Counter
Tops - Electric Stove/oven - Full Fridge - Bedrooms have Large Closets - 1 Full Bath with Vanity
for Storage - Large north/west facing Balcony with view of downtown.
Pearl Manor has been a favorite residential choice for professionals,
business people, and others; who seek a well maintained home in a high quality Denver neighborhood....
Located in the heart of Denver's Capitol Hill district, just minutes from Downtown Denver, cultural centers, excellent restaurants, and fabulous shopping.
Common Bar-B-Q & Beautiful Pool with Lounging Area
Keyed Entrance Building/Parking on lot when available $100/month
Tenant is responsible for all utilities
